ModMetaData.name: Milkshakes - Blueberry & Strawberry Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1] [b]Warning: Do not use this mod with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595120517]Milkshakes - Berry Edition[/url][/b]
My milkshake brings all the modders to the yard.
This mod adds 3 new craftable recreation/luxury food, and introduces a berry sorting recipe to split mixed berries into blueberry and strawberries.
[b]Features:[/b] Items: [list] [*]New berries textures [*]Blueberries (Sorted from berries) [*]Strawberries (Sorted from berries) [/list] Milkshakes [list] [*]Mixed Berry Milkshakes (Recreation/Luxury Food) [*]Blueberry Milkshakes (Recreation/Luxury Food) [*]Strawberry Milkshakes (Recreation/Luxury Food) [/list] Grants Mood Buff (2) for 18 hours after consumption.
[h1]Want the full collection instead? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url][/h1]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630669656]RimFantasy - Gemstones[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2630670287]RimFantasy - Temperature Regulation[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2632845986]RimFantasy - Crystallic Lighting[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2634323159]RimFantasy - Arcane Batons[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2591782692]Milkshakes[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595706669]Milkshakes - Ambrosia Edition[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2594428074]Milkshakes - Chocolate Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]This mod replaces [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595120517]Milkshakes - Berry Edition[/url][/b] [*]Compatible as long as you're not lactose intolerant. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Wow, so balanced.
